entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • JSON deserialization fails in iOS release build if class implements an interface #75802
  • mono AOT compiler cannot resolve and inline static virtual calls in gshared methods #75801
  • On Linux, the `KeyChar` of the `ConsoleKeyInfo` returned from `Ctrl+c` becomes `\0` with .NET 7-RC.1 #75795
  • NETSDK1191 error when building crossgen2.csproj with RC2 SDK #75794
  • GCStress crash stable repro #75792
    7.0.0
  • Vector128 and Vector256 General purpose DotProduct tests fail #75791

Closed

  • Vector.IsHardwareAccelerated result differs when called directly and called via reflection #38162
    8.0.0
  • bug in IRootFunctions double.Hypot #75651
    7.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] error when compiling tests #75780
  • SPMI collection of coreclr R2R and similar tests is failing #75539
    8.0.0
  • NTLM fails for HTTP only connection #75579
  • JIT: libraries jitstress failures Assertion failed 'addr->TypeIs(TYP_BYREF)' #75644
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\Directed\\StrAccess\\straccess1_cs_ro\\straccess1_cs_ro.cmd #75659
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_70790/Runtime_70790/Runtime_70790.sh #75657
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT] Make conservative stack reporting configurable. #75803
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] hide interop delegates from intellisense #75800
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0-rc2] [wasm] fix missing managed stack trace on managed exceptions marshaled to JS #75799
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Add debugger display for huge BigInteger #75796
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Only R2R blittable IL stubs that aren't inlined #75793
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, needs-author-action, 8.0.0

Merged

  • Updating Vector*.IsHardwareAccelerated to be recursive #69578
    area-System.Numerics, 7.0.0
  • Ensure that all paths of double.Hypot use the absolute value where required #75776
    area-System.Numerics
  • Remove unused Utils file #75777
    area-System.Security
  • [wasm] Add workaround for msbuild issue in tests #75743
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [NativeAOT] Fix building src/tests #75781
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use *_NOCTOR jit helpers version once class is initialized #75785
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Don't set JitPath for coreclr test SPMI collections #75765
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] fix missing managed stack trace on managed exceptions marshaled to JS #75678
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Don't propagate const TYP_REF as TYP_I_IMPL #75661
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0

Updated

  • Extend RuntimeHelpers.IsBitwiseEquatable to more types #75640
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Allocate RuntimeType objects on Frozen Object Heap #75573
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Skip frozen segments for commit accounting #75738
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Enable CI for macOS x64/arm64 #75421
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Fix some incorrect SpecialFolder entries for Unix #68610
    area-System.Runtime, breaking-change, os-linux, os-mac-os-x, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Memory model document. #75790
    memory model
  • Add Darc dependency entries for our dependencies on Roslyn #75617
    area-Infrastructure, 8.0.0
  • Audit MemoryExtensions.IndexOf variants #75754
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • JIT: Evaluate GDV call args early #75634
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Update gtHasLocalsWithAddrOp to use GenTreeVisitor #75672
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Ensure Max/Min for floating-point on x86/x64 are not handled as commutative #75772
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove XmlConvert.StrEqual and use Span<char>.StartsWith() instead. #74955
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix behavior of JMC #75783
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [JIT] CodeGen verification testing #75102
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Hardware intrinsics tests in new style #74886
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • [release/7.0-rc2] Do not request type layout for RuntimeDetermined types #75789
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
